00034 // privileges checking
00035 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('stock_take', 'r');
00036 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('stock_take', 'w');
00037 
00038 if (!($can_read AND $can_write)) {
00039     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You don\'t have enough privileges to access this area!').'</div>');

00042 // check if there is any active stock take proccess
00043 $stk_query = $dbs->query("SELECT * FROM stock_take WHERE is_active=1");
00044 if (!$stk_query->num_rows) {
00045     echo '<div class="errorBox">'.__('NO stock taking proccess running!').'</div>';
00046     die();
00047 }
00048 
00049 if (isset($_POST['confirmFinish'])) {
00050     set_time_limit(0);
00051     // get currently active stock take name
00052     $stk_take_q = $dbs->query('SELECT stock_take_name, stock_take_id FROM stock_take WHERE is_active=1');
00053     $stk_take_d = $stk_take_q->fetch_row();
00054     // update stock take finish time
00055     $finish_time_q = $dbs->query('UPDATE stock_take SET end_date=NOW() WHERE is_active=1');
00056     $stk_take_report_filename = strtolower(str_replace(' ', '_', trim($stk_take_d[0]))).'_report.html';
00057     if ($dbs->affected_rows) {
00058         // purge item data
00059         if (isset($_POST['purge']) AND !empty($_POST['purge'])) {
00060             // purge data in item table
00061             $purge_item_q = $dbs->query('DELETE FROM item WHERE item_id IN (SELECT item_id FROM stock_take_item WHERE status=\'m\')');
00062             // purge data in loan table
00063             $purge_loan_q = $dbs->query('DELETE FROM loan WHERE item_code IN (SELECT item_code FROM stock_take_item WHERE status=\'m\')');
00064         }
00065         // start output buffering content for report generation
00066         ob_start();
00067         echo '<html><head><title>'.$stk_take_d[0].' Report</title>';
00068         echo '<meta http-equiv="Pragma" content="No-Cache">'."\n";
00069         echo '<meta http-equiv="Cache-Control" content="No-Cache">'."\n";
00070         echo '<style type="text/css">'."\n";
00071         echo 'body {padding: 0.2cm}'."\n";
00072         echo 'body * {color: black; font-size: 11pt;}'."\n";
00073         echo 'table {border: 1px solid #000000;}'."\n";
00074         echo '.dataListHeader {background-color: #000000; color: white; font-weight: bold;}'."\n";
00075         echo '.alterCell {border-bottom: 1px solid #666666; background-color: #CCCCCC;}'."\n";
00076         echo '.alterCell2 {border-bottom: 1px solid #666666; background-color: #FFFFFF;}'."\n";
00077         echo '</style>'."\n";
00078         echo '</head>';
00079         echo '<body>'."\n";
00080         define('REPORT_DIRECT_INCLUDE', true);
00081         // stock take general report
00082         echo '<h3>'.$stk_take_d[0].' - Stock Take Report</h3><hr />';
00083         include MODULES_BASE_DIR.'stock_take/st_report.php';
00084 
00085         // cell row class
00086         $cellClass = 'alterCell';
00087         // stock take lost item list
00088         $lost_item_q = $dbs->query('SELECT item_code, title, classification, coll_type_name, call_number FROM stock_take_item WHERE status=\'m\'');
00089         if ($lost_item_q->num_rows > 0) {
00090             echo '<br />';
00091             echo '<h3>LOST Item list</h3><hr size="1" />';
00092             echo '<table style="width: 100%; border: 1px solid #666666;" cellspacing="0">';
00093             echo '<tr>';
00094             echo '<th class="dataListHeader">Item Code</th>
00095                 <th class="dataListHeader">Document Title</th>
00096                 <th class="dataListHeader">Classification</th>';
00097             echo '</tr>'."\n";
00098             while ($lost_item_d = $lost_item_q->fetch_row()) {
00099                 $cellClass = ($cellClass == 'alterCell')?'alterCell2':'alterCell';
00100                 echo '<tr><td class="'.$cellClass.'">'.$lost_item_d[0].'</td>
00101                     <td class="'.$cellClass.'">'.$lost_item_d[1].'</td>
00102                     <td class="'.$cellClass.'">'.$lost_item_d[2].'</td>';
00103                 echo '</tr>'."\n";
00104             }
00105             echo '</table>'."\n";
00106             unset($lost_item_q);
00107         }
00108 
00109         // stock take error logs
00110         $error_log_q = $dbs->query('SELECT log_date, log_msg FROM system_log WHERE log_location=\'stock_take\' AND log_msg LIKE \'Stock Take ERROR%\'');
00111         if ($error_log_q->num_rows > 0) {
00112             echo '<br />';
00113             echo '<h3>Stock Take Error Logs</h3><hr size="1" />';
00114             echo '<table style="width: 100%; border: 1px solid #666666;" cellspacing="0">';
00115             echo '<tr>';
00116             echo '<th class="dataListHeader">Time</th>
00117                 <th class="dataListHeader">Message</th>';
00118             echo '</tr>';
00119             while ($error_log_d = $error_log_q->fetch_row()) {
00120                 $cellClass = ($cellClass == 'alterCell')?'alterCell2':'alterCell';
00121                 echo '<tr>';
00122                 echo '<td class="'.$cellClass.'">'.$error_log_d[0].'</td><td class="'.$cellClass.'">'.$error_log_d[1].'</td>';
00123                 echo '</tr>';
00124             }
00125             echo '</table>';
00126             unset($error_log_q);
00127         }
00128         echo '</html>';
00129         $html_str = ob_get_clean();
00130         // put html to file
00131         $file_write = @file_put_contents(REPORT_FILE_BASE_DIR.$stk_take_report_filename, $html_str);
00132         if ($file_write) {
00133             // open result in new window
00134             echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.openWin(\''.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'/'.FILES_DIR.'/'.REPORT_DIR.'/'.$stk_take_report_filename.'\', \'popMemberReport\', 800, 500, true)</script>';
00135         } else { utility::jsAlert('ERROR! Stock take report failed to generate, possibly because '.REPORT_FILE_BASE_DIR.' directory is not writable'); }
00136         // update
00137         $update_st_q = $dbs->query("UPDATE stock_take SET report_file='$stk_take_report_filename' WHERE is_active=1");
00138         // set currently active stock take process to unactive
00139         $inactive_q = $dbs->query('UPDATE stock_take SET is_active=0');
00140         // clean all current stock take error log
00141         $error_log_q = $dbs->query('DELETE FROM system_log WHERE log_location=\'stock_take\' AND log_msg LIKE \'Stock Take ERROR%\'');
00142         // write log
00143         utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'stock_take', $_SESSION['realname'].' finish stock take ('.$stk_take_d[0].') from address '.$_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']);
00144         // send an alert
00145         echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00146         echo 'alert(\''.__('Stock Take Proccess Finished!').'\');';
00147         echo 'parent.location.href = \''.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'admin/index.php?mod=stock_take\';';
00148         echo '</script>';
00149     }
00150     exit();
00151 } else {

00155     <strong style="color: #FF0000;"><?php echo strtoupper(__('Finish Stock Take')); ?><hr />
00156     <?php echo __('Are you sure to end current stock take proccess? Once it finished there is no way you can rollback this stock take'); ?>
